description.value:
A corpseward pendant is usually shaped like the skull of a humanoid or small animal.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You become undetectable to undead creatures for 10 minutes. Undead can't see, hear, or smell you, nor detect you with sensory capabilities such as tremorsense. A creature can attempt a single @Check[type:will|dc:18] saving throw to ignore this effect. If an undead has reason to believe that undetected opponents are present, it can still attempt to Seek or Strike you. If you attempt to use a vitality spell to damage undead, use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Command Undead], touch or damage an undead creature, or attack any creature while warded in this manner, the pendant's effects immediately end. An undead creature who observes you in this manner or one who succeeds at the Will save is immune to the corpseward pendant for 24 hours.
